attributes.action: start providing governmental funding to the video games industry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasingly video games are being recognised as a legitimate art-form. The government pours millions into the creation of more traditional art forms, but overlooks the struggling video game industry. With recent moves made by both America and France in this area, the UK currently risks falling behind.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
